about_the_game:
About the game:

-- Construction --: In the game, you can collect resources and use them to build your castle and house to resist the enemy's attack.

-- Battle --: There are enemy patrols every night, so be ready to pick up your weapons to meet the enemy. Defeat the enemy and retrieve the architectural drawings they have stolen to unlock more buildings.

-- Capture enemies --: Yes, in addition to fighting, we can also capture them with ropes and use them for you. In addition, we can also bribe other creatures to help us fight.

-- Teamwork --: You can give orders to other villagers, let them play to their strengths and better cooperate with your actions.

-- Day and night system --: How to arrange your time every day and how to make decisions is entirely up to you.
